# secondaryText

**Instance Property**

The secondary text.

## Declaration

```swift
var secondaryText: String? { get set }
```

## Customizing content

- **image**: The image to display.
- **text**: The primary text.
- **attributedText**: An attributed variant of the primary text.
- **secondaryAttributedText**: An attributed variant of the secondary text.

items.description: An attributed variant of the primary text.
items.name: attributedText

items.description: An attributed variant of the secondary text.
